messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] my apologies
messages.msgSnippet: Okokokokokokokok. I haven t looked beacause, well, I m just lazy BUT I thought that in one of the gospels it did say that Judas hung himself. Am I also
messages.messageBody:
Okokokokokokokok. I haven't looked beacause, well, I'm just lazy BUT I
thought that in one of the gospels it did say that Judas hung himself.
Am I also imagining things?

Liza

messages.subject: my apologies
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/25/03 11:17:54 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/25/03 11:17:54 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But may I add...if my silly reaction to the Judas question offended
this group, then this group is easily offended. >>

It didn't offend me at all Heidi. I hope you aren't going to feel awful about
this...
You confirmed my suspicion that most Bible literalists don't really study the
Bible objectively, but beyond that, no harm done.
It's not worth getting upset over, your humble apology was sweet. thank you.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
